message.body: Hey sorry to bother you lily!! I know we were all up late last night... And I hope you and nick had a good post wedding! Patrick is trying to reach Ellen, he asked me to text you to ask el to call him....
Hi!! No bother at all... Sorry we snuck out early I'm sorry if I didn't say goodbye properly - I don't even remember ha. Anyway, Ellen left for the train this morning so I'm not wih her
Her phone may have died. I can call her but I suspect Patrick has already done that?
Haha oh good! Glad we all got to hang out
Are you already on your way back to Boston
Me too when I'd next time???? Also I texted Nitzan! That was a nice thing to do right not too intrusive or anything!! Right?
When is next time we all get to see each other? Not i'd. Also I am waiting for my bus yes
But nadine stayed she's seeing a man
